ComicInfo.Summary: A black psychiatrist, J. C. Pratt, dresses up in a costume, grabs two big guns, and beats the snot out of drug dealers in Empire City and Liberty City as The Crush. The Squeegee is on the loose, killing and removing the faces of his victims.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:50:29. [Issue ID 108960]
ComicInfo.Characters: Emma Long,Ed Dexter,Albert Feldstein,Squeegee (Hector Diaz) (first off-panel appearance),Roy Radnauer,The Crush (J. C. Pratt) (first appearance),Derek Dixon,Roswell Amis
ComicInfo.Colorist: Christopher Sotomayor,Chris McGee,Pamela May Palma,Maria T. Sanchez,Lawrence Boutte,Christopher Sotomayor,Chris McGee,Pamela May Palma,Maria T. Sanchez,Lawrence Boutte
